EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email Campaign_Liberty Mutual Cust Page_Q416.Invite 11-8-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn how Liberty Mutual accelerated speed to market with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
"One of the things we've learned is that if you can't get it to market more quickly, there is no doubt that the market will have changed and no matter how well you've engineered it or built it or deployed it or trained your folks, it's not going to be quite right because it's just a little too late."
—James McGlennon Executive VP and CIO, Liberty Mutual
Tell me more now <[[https://pivotal.io/liberty-mutual?utm_campaign=pcf_labs_list&utm_medium=email&utm_source=pivotal_marketo]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
For more than 100 years, Liberty Mutual has helped people protect what they earn, build, own, and cherish. It’s their promise to their customers. At Pivotal, we help enterprise customers, like the technology team at Liberty Mutual, transform the way they build software.
The result? A stalwart, Fortune 500 company that’s actually leading the way in app development to improve lives and communities. In other words, a total transformation in how they drive software delivery that promises to disrupt the insurance industry from the inside.
Want to learn more?
Watch the videos and listen to the podcasts here <[[https://pivotal.io/liberty-mutual]]>, including a multi-part discussion with Liberty Mutual’s CIO James McGlennon as he discusses the company’s journey—the risks and rewards, the wins and the failures and everything in between—with Pivotal’s Executive Chairman of the Board, Paul Maritz.
If you’re ready to start your transformation journey, contact us <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]> here and someone will be in touch with you soon to explore your use case and answer your questions.
Best, The Pivotal Team
